instructions: On your iOS device, swipe right from the left edge of the Home screen or the Lock screen to open Today View . Scroll to the bottom of the list of widgets, then tap Edit. In the Add Widgets screen, tap to the left of Shortcuts. Tap Done to return to Today View . Tip: You can also add the Shortcuts widget to Today View by pressing the Shortcuts app icon on the Home screen of an iPhone that supports 3D Touch , then tapping Add Widget.
